overview: Anthony Juliano is a renaissance man enjoying a seasoned background in Technology Sales and IT Operations stemming from diverse experience working in Silicon Valley. His professional history includes technology sales, enterprise ownership, network administration, and infrastructure/architecture strategy for a variety of technology corporations. Most recently he directed technical integration and security architecture for Wine.com the nation’s leading online wine retailer. At Landmark, Anthony is responsible for daily interaction with Fortune 500 executives driving the business development strategy for a diverse set of technology clients. He additionally directs Landmark’s IT operations and controls the firm’s enterprise technology strategy. Anthony is a Dean’s list graduate from Northwestern University with a B.A. double major in Political Science and Philosophy and minor in Legal Studies.
